experience.title: Summer Intern
experience.description: - Assisted a client in transitioning $80Mn loan from LIBOR to SOFR by reviewing the head of terms and swap agreement- Identified and discussed negtiation points in the SWAP agreement to make the transaction cost neutral to the client- Researched for best practices to write Excel macros to improve the speed of execution of financial models- Assisted in drafting a proposal for a potential client by attending the call and understanding their requirements- Utilized Bloomberg terminal to determine the suitable Credit Adjustment Spread for the transition
